scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix kupipodariday-backend && npm install --prefix kupipodariday-frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd kupipodariday-frontend && npm run lint || echo 'Frontend lint not configured'
scripts.clean: rimraf kupipodariday-backend/dist kupipodariday-backend/node_modules kupipodariday-frontend/build kupipodariday-frontend/node_modules node_modules
